channel.title: Jarring help urgent
channel.description:
so i got a blank pi and client, and i have put some work into it. A few friends wanted ot play so i todl them id make a client.
When i go to jar it, it won't open, so i got the debugger and it says " Usage: Portid Node Highmem"
Help?
@echo off title * - Loading color 0a cd ./bin/ "%HOMEDRIVE%\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Jframe 30 0 highmem members 32 exit
works fine as a .bat but when i jar it doesnt

item.title: Jarring help urgent
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Make sure to set the manifest correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Jarring help urgent
item.dc:creator: @Chachai Chachai
item.description:
@Chachai wrote:

so i got a blank pi and client, and i have put some work into it. A few friends wanted ot play so i todl them id make a client.

When i go to jar it, it wonâ€™t open, so i got the debugger and it says " Usage: Portid Node Highmem"

Help?

@echo off
title * - Loading
color 0a
cd ./bin/
"%HOMEDRIVE%\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Jframe 30 0 highmem members 32
exit

works fine as a .bat but when i jar it doesnt
